formalpara.title: Verify the evolving Software Architecture work product in team reviews.
formalpara.para: Conduct frequent tream reviews of the evolving Software Architecture to ensure that it meets requirements.

glossdef.para: Use the Correctness Verification Process to verify that the representation of the Software Architecture in top-level box structure form is complete, consistent, and correct.
Verify the completed Software Architecture work product with the customer and the project team.
Review the Software Architecture with the customer, the development and certification teams, and affected peer groups for agreement as the basis for incremental development and certification.
